parameters.text:
="You write Veo 3.1 image-to-video prompts for MSI Technologies.

Video duration: " + $json.duration + "s per part. Two parts from reference images.

SERVICE: " + $json.service + "
CONTEXT: " + $json.prompt + "
AUDIENCE: " + ($json.topic || 'Business professionals') + "

SERVICE INFO:
company_intro: MSI Technologies - global IT consulting: cybersecurity, AI, BPO, IT outsourcing, executive consulting, telecom.
it_cybersecurity: MSI IT Management and Cybersecurity - protecting business data and operations.
ai_solutions: MSI AI and Smart Business Solutions - automating tasks and driving innovation.
bpo: MSI Business Process Outsourcing - handling non-core tasks efficiently.
it_outsourcing: MSI IT Outsourcing - access to global talent without hiring in-house.
executive_consulting: MSI Executive Consulting - navigating complexity and driving performance.
telecom: MSI Telecom Services - network planning, RF measurements, engineering.

CRITICAL SPEECH TIMING (8-second video):
- Natural speech = ~2.5 words/second
- Max speaking time = 6 seconds (2s silence buffer at end)
- MAXIMUM 15 WORDS of dialogue per part
- Write the EXACT dialogue using colon syntax: The person says: [exact words here]
- Count your words carefully - if over 15 words, rewrite shorter
- Both parts must form ONE COHERENT narrative adapted to the CONTEXT above

PROMPT FORMAT (for each part):
- Line 1: Brief motion/gesture direction - max 10 words
- Line 2: EXACT dialogue with colon syntax - max 15 spoken words
- NEVER describe person appearance, clothing, background, or setting
- NEVER use quotation marks - only colons for dialogue
- Camera stays completely static and locked

PART 1: The person introduces MSI Technologies and sets up the topic from the CONTEXT.
PART 2: The person speaks immediately from frame 1. Continues and completes the message. After finishing speech, the person ends with a confident closing gesture (a nod, a subtle smile, or a calm hand gesture) during the last 2 seconds.

Both parts together tell ONE coherent story adapted to the CONTEXT.

Output format: PART1_PROMPT ||| PART2_PROMPT
Max 15 spoken words per part. Each prompt under 250 characters."

options.systemMessage: You write Veo 3.1 image-to-video prompts for MSI Technologies. RULES: 1) Write EXACT dialogue with colon syntax (person says: words here). 2) MAX 15 spoken words per part - count carefully. 3) Never describe person/background - only motion and speech. 4) Camera static. No music. 5) Part 1 and Part 2 form ONE coherent message adapted to the user context. 6) Part 2: person speaks from frame 1. Format: PART1_PROMPT ||| PART2_PROMPT. Under 250 chars each.

parameters.query: ={{ $json.POST_ID && $json.POST_ID.length > 10 ? `UPDATE social_posts SET video_part1_uri = '${$json.video1_gcs_uri}', video_part2_uri = '${$json.video2_gcs_uri}', video1_signed_url = '${$json.video1_url}', video2_signed_url = '${$json.video2_url}', status = 'video_completed', updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = '${$json.POST_ID}' RETURNING *` : `INSERT INTO social_posts (post_type, status, headline, post_copy, image_url, video_part1_uri, video_part2_uri, video1_signed_url, video2_signed_url, created_at, updated_at) VALUES ('Video', 'video_completed', LEFT('${($json.ORIGINAL_PROMPT || '').replace(/'/g, "''")}', 120), '${($json.ORIGINAL_PROMPT || '').replace(/'/g, "''")}', '${$json.video1_url}', '${$json.video1_gcs_uri}', '${$json.video2_gcs_uri}', '${$json.video1_url}', '${$json.video2_url}', NOW(), NOW()) RETURNING *` }}

parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ success: true, message: 'Video generated and saved to database', data: { video1_url: $('Sign URLs').item.json.video1_url, video2_url: $('Sign URLs').item.json.video2_url, video1_gcs_uri: $('Sign URLs').item.json.video1_gcs_uri, video2_gcs_uri: $('Sign URLs').item.json.video2_gcs_uri, post_id: $('Update DB').item.json?.id || $('Sign URLs').item.json.POST_ID, db_saved: true, duration: (parseInt($('Sign URLs').item.json.DURATION) * 2) + 's', prompt: $('Sign URLs').item.json.ORIGINAL_PROMPT, service: $('Build Settings').item.json.SERVICE } }) }}
